title: Bio
mainTitle: I focus on creating great, accessible and rich web experiences for everyone. I've been lucky enough to have been doing that for the last 14 years.
description: Besides working as a Senior Frontend Engineer, on my free time I usually go out and explore the fantastic world of craft beers, rock out to some great live music and hit the gym whenever I can.
